The House

Over 12,000 sq.ft. of luxury including a pool, hot tub, separate pool house, large fire pit, full size volleyball court, tether ball, corn hole boards, croquet, small basketball court, some frisbee golf targets (bring your own discs) and a 16 seat home theater.

The Ark on Lake Lanier

Accommodates 45 People with 14 sleeping areas, including 8 king, 3 queen, 1 full and 15 twin beds, the Ark has room for 10 different families.

Numerous Amenities including a hot tub, pool, boats, jetskis, billiards, theater room, firepit, volleyball court and more!

The Outside

On the grounds we have a swimming pool, hot tub, beach volleyball court, in-ground trampoline, and a firepit with seating for 20+ people. Oh yeah, and a dock on the lake!

Previous Next

Inside

Over 12,000 sq. ft. of space to relax and hang out with friends. There are two great rooms, ping-pong, billiards, and a 16-seat home theater to watch movies or the game!

Previous Next

Bedrooms and Bathrooms

14 sleeping areas, including 8 king, 3 queen, 1 full, and 15 twin beds across the main house and two cabins. We have room for everyone. Bring a +1... there's plenty of space for couples!

Previous Next
